Service Details: - Offers a non-auditioned adult choir for those who love to sing, enjoy music of all genres, and have fun learning about music in an environment that supports enthusiastic members- Welcomes singers to come  to sit in on a rehearsal before registering- Puts on a concert at the end of November, and another in early April
How to Apply: Please visit the website for details
Meetings: Rehearsals:  Wed: 7:00pm - 9:00pm @ First Mennonite Church (1305 Gordon Dr, Kelowna)Fall session:  Sep-DecSpring session: Jan-Apr
